a.title: Explicit statement about declining the dispense request (prescription), usually recorded in order to communicate the issue back to the prescriber. Reasons for declining a dispense may vary, but typically this statement is only sent when a following action is expected on the prescriber’s side (cancelling or changing the problematic prescription or the whole treatment).

tr.td: Additional information about why the dispensation was declined.

description.value: Explicit statement about declining the dispense request (prescription), usually recorded in order to communicate the issue back to the prescriber. Reasons for declining a dispense may vary, but typically this statement is only sent when a following action is expected on the prescriber’s side (cancelling or changing the problematic prescription or the whole treatment).

definition.value: Explicit statement about declining the dispense request (prescription), usually recorded in order to communicate the issue back to the prescriber. Reasons for declining a dispense may vary, but typically this statement is only sent when a following action is expected on the prescriber’s side (cancelling or changing the problematic prescription or the whole treatment).

short.value: Common header for all patient-related data

definition.value: Common header for all patient-related data
Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.
Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

short.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource

definition.value: Date and time of the last update to the document/information

short.value: Reason for not dispensing the medication

definition.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.
Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

short.value: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document

definition.value: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document

short.value: The single-item prescription or prescription line item that was declined by the dispenser. [Used for searching]

definition.value: The single-item prescription or prescription line item that was declined by the dispenser. [Used for searching]

short.value: Additional information about why the dispensation was declined.

definition.value: Additional information about why the dispensation was declined.

Explicit statement about declining the dispense request (prescription), usually recorded in order to communicate the issue back to the prescriber. Reasons for declining a dispense may vary, but typically this statement is only sent when a following action is expected on the prescriber’s side (cancelling or changing the problematic prescription or the whole treatment).
